name: Hidden in Plain Sight (itch)
description: You will have to navigate your way through the level to the briefcase. There will be enemies randomly moving around level. If they get sight of you, they will start to chase you until they have caught you, or they lose sight of the you.  You can either avoid the enemies altogether or you can transform into an object to hide. If you change into an object that is not close to them the enemy will know that you are fake and will chase you.
